title: Video Machine Learning Engineer
summary: Imagine what you could do here! At Apple, new insights have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Do you bring passion and dedication to your job? If so, we are looking for individuals like you. We are looking for talent who will join us to craft the future of video. Our team develops cutting edge machine learning technology and system that enable intelligent and interactive video experience in Apple’s products, such as Photos, Camera, Spotlight, FaceTime, AirPlay, SideCar, TV+, etc. You will work closely with a group of highly motivated specialists to develop exciting machine learning technologies that will make a huge impact in the products.
description: As a video machine learning algorithm engineer in our team, you will be responsible for developing machine learning technologies, implementing and optimizing the solution, and shipping it in the products. You will be responsible for developing new algorithms, improving existing ones, designing neural network architectures, training, implementing, integrating and optimizing networks, etc.
preferred_qualifications: MS Computer Science or MS Electrical Engineering or equivalent
additional_requirements: This posting is not for a specific job opening and by submitting your resume you are expressing interest in being contacted about this type of role at Apple in the future.
